name: CTRL FREAK [Demo]
description:
CTRL FREAK is an interactive visual novel in which your decisions determine the fate of both the City and characters within.

When a blackout changes Al the AI, and her distressed household demand action, she and one member of the household step up. Their actions will set off a chain of events that will change both the City and the household's relationships with each other, all at Al's beck and call.

Attention! Web version will not work on Chrome or Edge. Another web browser is required.

Demo Features:

- Unique pixel art style.

- 6,000+ words. 

- 4+ tracks of original soundtrack.

- Full common route.

Full game will feature:

- Three routes.

- Multiple endings!

- Extended soundtrack!

- More areas, more art, more of everything essentially!

The Team:

BibiXP (Twitter) (Itch) - Responsible for Art/UI/Music/Programming.

Drakka (Twitter) (Itch) - Responsible for Writing/Concept Art.
